Text:
Why is it such a big deal that he was fucking biographer Paula Broadwell? So what if he was married? So what if he was head of the CIA?

We all got here on earth the same way, by fucking.

It seems he might have given her top secret info based on rumors that are circulating.  I doubt he resigned JUST because of the affair.  Clinton had a fling with the intern and he didn't quit, and his title was obviously more important than any CIA title.  I suspect there was more going on than we know about.
